General.Name: Yaxing Chem
General.Description: Weifang Yaxing Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, operation, import, and sale of chemical materials in China and internationally. It offers chlorinated polyethylene CPE, azodicarbonamide blowing agent, industrial hydrazine hydrate, sodium hydroxide, liquid chlorine, and hydrochloric acid. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Weifang, China.
General.Address: No. 321, East Beigong Street, Weifang, China
